name: Avoid using obsolete "Definition/Allocation/Array Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the programs having obsolete "Definition/Allocation/Array Operations" statements.
output:
This report lists RPG400 programs using obsolete "Definition/Allocation/Array Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: During the upgrade of the different RPG versions (V2 / V3 / ILE V4) some statements are no longer supported. Where ever in the code these statements the artifact is reported as a violation.
remediation: Try to replace these statements with their free format counterparts if possible.
remediationSample: Use free format equivalent of operations as described in  https://publib.boulder.ibm.com/iseries/v5r2/ic2924/books/c092508430.htm#HDROPERXCL
sample: You can see the source at  https://publib.boulder.ibm.com/iseries/v5r2/ic2924/books/c092508430.htm#HDROPERXCL
alternativeName: Avoid using obsolete "Definition/Allocation/Array Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)  (RPG400)
